basic.description: This course offers a quantitative treatment of core problems in the investment industry.  Topics include techniques and analysis of active portfolio management including risk factor models and mean-variance optimization, the Martingale approach to derivative pricing for both discrete and continuous models, applied stochastic calculus, and stochastic interest rate models.
basic.subject: MAP
basic.title: Financial Engineering I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: FIN 5515, MAP 5601, and MAP 5611. Recommended prerequisite: STA 5807.
